content: Office of Strategic Initiatives, Data Analysis, Assessment, and Technology

The Office is responsible for the oversight of the planning, implementation and assessment of the Divisionâ€™s strategic initiatives with particular emphasis on the research priorities identified in the new university-wide strategic plan.  This includes developing roadmaps for extramural funding pursuits for UAlbany faculty for research and training.  The Office also seeks to foster research affiliations across the public and private sector that will lead to joint research collaborations and external funding endeavors.
